author: roddey
msg: There is now an official URL for the magic "xmlns" prefix. So I updated our code
to use this new URL, instead of the proprietary one we used previously.

author: roddey
msg: If an entity ends on the last > of some markup, then the end of entity
won't be sent because the end of entity is not sensed.

author: abagchi
msg: Packing now works on Win32 with ICU 1.4

author: roddey
msg: More recovery from the move away from the util/xx streams.

author: roddey
msg: Fixed a couple of small reported bugs, in the parsing code and in the
special cased local file stream creation code.
